item.title: python tricks
item.author: thanhngvpt
item.description:
Unpacking

# 1
a, b, c = 1, 2, 3
d = a, b, c
print(d, type(d)) # (1, 2, 3) - tuple
# 2
a, b, c = (2 * i + 1 for i in range(3))
d = a, b, c
print(d) # (1, 3, 5)
# 3
a, (b, c), d = [1, (2, 3), 5]
print(a, b, c, d) # 1 2 3 5
